description: This is a Java interface named ObjectIPC that defines methods for encoding and decoding objects to and from JSON format for transmission over sockets.

classes.name: ObjectIPC
classes.description: An interface specifying methods for JSON serialization and deserialization of objects for IPC.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Serializes the object to a JSON object for transmission.

methods.name: fromJSON
methods.description: Deserializes the object from a JSON object received over IPC.
